description: The Stinger cocktail is a popular drink that people around the world have enjoyed for decades. Originally developed in the 1890s in the United States, this mouthwatering duo cocktail consists of&nbsp;cognac or&nbsp;brandy and crème de menthe and is perfect for enjoying during warmer weather.Often considered an upscale beverage, the Stinger has made appearances in pop culture as well, from films to songs to literature. This tasty cocktail will delight any palate, whether sipped at a sophisticated soiree or shared with friends on a sweltering summer afternoon.So next time you're looking for a quick escape from the heat, why not indulge in a Stinger and take a moment to savor those&nbsp;fleeting summer moments?
